alternating-sections-left-start.name: Alternating Sections (Start Left)
alternating-sections-left-start.description: Multiple sections that alternate image position starting with image on left
alternating-sections-left-start.usage: Hub pages that showcase multiple offerings (e.g., Markets hub)

alternating-sections-right-start.name: Alternating Sections (Start Right)
alternating-sections-right-start.description: Multiple sections that alternate image position starting with image on right
alternating-sections-right-start.usage: Top-level pages with multiple content blocks (e.g., Services page)

alternating-sections-with-sibling-nav.name: Alternating Sections + Sibling Navigation
alternating-sections-with-sibling-nav.description: Standard alternating layout with sibling navigation bar for spoke pages
alternating-sections-with-sibling-nav.usage: Spoke pages within a hub that need sibling navigation (e.g., MLM, Party Plan)

hub-with-tab-menu.name: Hub Page with Tab Menu
hub-with-tab-menu.description: Hub page with horizontal tab menu for sub-sections
hub-with-tab-menu.usage: Hub pages with multiple internal sections (e.g., Features hub)

simple-text-page.name: Simple Text Page
simple-text-page.description: Single-column text content with optional sections
simple-text-page.usage: Privacy policy, terms of service, about pages

hero-with-features.name: Hero Banner + Feature Grid
hero-with-features.description: Large hero banner at top followed by feature grid

form-page.name: Form Page
form-page.description: Page centered around a contact or data collection form
form-page.usage: Contact page, demo request, newsletter signup

gallery-page.name: Gallery Page
gallery-page.description: Image gallery with optional text sections

spoke-with-left-sidebar.name: Spoke Page with Left Sidebar
spoke-with-left-sidebar.description: Spoke page with vertical left sidebar navigation

custom-sections.name: Custom Sections (Manual Control)
custom-sections.description: Fully customizable page with manual section definitions

contentLayout.note: Requires explicit section definitions in page.json

custom-sections.usage: Complex pages that don't fit standard patterns
